Divine.short_description: Relating to or emanating from ultimate sacred reality or godhead.

Celestial.short_description: Connected to heavenly or cosmic realms beyond physical plane.

Elemental.short_description: Pertaining to fundamental forces of nature: earth, air, fire, water, ether.

Ethereal.short_description: Extremely delicate and light, of the heavens or spirit world.

Astral.short_description: Relating to non-physical plane of consciousness and spiritual travel.

Solar.short_description: Connected to sun's spiritual properties of illumination and life-force.

Lunar.short_description: Associated with moon's mystical qualities of intuition and cycles.

Cosmic.short_description: Pertaining to universal consciousness and higher dimensional realms.

Shamanic.short_description: Related to spirit world interaction and nature-based mysticism.

Mystical.short_description: Direct experiential knowledge of transcendent or ultimate reality.

Alchemical.short_description: Concerning spiritual and material transformation processes.

Tantric.short_description: Esoteric traditions using energy and consciousness for awakening.

Yogic.short_description: Relating to union of individual with universal consciousness.

Hermetic.short_description: Concerning ancient wisdom traditions of spiritual transformation.

Gnostic.short_description: Direct spiritual knowledge and enlightenment through inner knowing.

Karmic.short_description: Pertaining to law of cause and effect in spiritual evolution.

Dharmic.short_description: Related to cosmic law, duty, and righteous living.

Esoteric.short_description: Hidden spiritual knowledge reserved for initiated practitioners.

Occult.short_description: Knowledge of hidden or supernatural powers and practices.

Metaphysical.short_description: Transcending physical matter, concerning fundamental nature of reality.

Theological.short_description: Study and understanding of divine nature and religious truth.

Mystical.short_description: Direct communion with ultimate or divine reality.

Prophetic.short_description: Relating to divine revelation and spiritual foresight.

Contemplative.short_description: Deep spiritual reflection and meditative practice.

Devotional.short_description: Focused on worship and loving dedication to divine.

Ascetic.short_description: Severe self-discipline and abstention for spiritual purposes.

Monastic.short_description: Religious community life dedicated to spiritual practice.

Initiatic.short_description: Concerning spiritual transformation through sacred rituals.

Mantric.short_description: Using sacred sound vibrations for spiritual effect.

Causal.short_description: Primordial level of reality underlying manifestation.

Sacred.short_description: Connected to divine or ultimate spiritual reality.

Transcendent.short_description: Beyond ordinary physical and mental experience.

Immanent.short_description: Divine presence manifesting within material world.

Psychic.short_description: Extraordinary mental and spiritual perception abilities.

Mediumistic.short_description: Communication with spiritual entities and realms.

Oracular.short_description: Divine prophecy and spiritual guidance revelation.

Ceremonial.short_description: Formal ritual practices for spiritual purposes.

Magical.short_description: Manipulation of subtle energies and consciousness.

Shamanic.short_description: Spirit world journeying and healing practices.

Wisdom.short_description: Deep understanding of spiritual truth and reality.

Enlightened.short_description: State of highest spiritual realization and awakening.

Realized.short_description: Direct experience of ultimate spiritual truth.

Vedantic.short_description: Ultimate truth realization in Hindu philosophy.

Kabbalistic.short_description: Jewish mystical tradition of divine understanding.

Sufi.short_description: Islamic mystical path of divine love and wisdom.

Zen.short_description: Direct insight through meditation in Buddhist tradition.
